metadata.name: CHRONICLES 01 | NEON CITY
metadata.description:
The Liberator roamed the streets of Neon City, a cyberpunk metropolis known for its gloomy atmosphere and stark disparity between the rich and the poor.

The ship was a symbol of hope for those living in the crowded, polluted slums surrounding the industrial towers.  
Captain Arya couldn't help but feel a sense of sadness at the state of the world, a dark, dystopian earth.  
Behind the dazzling facade of Neon City, there was a cruel underbelly.  
Nestled between the towering skyscrapers was an oasis for the rich, a place where the elite could escape the harsh realities of the world.  
The Liberator often flew over this lush paradise, a stark contrast to the crumbling buildings and polluted streets of the rest of the city.

Arya couldn't help but wonder if one day, the rest of the city could be as prosperous.

Perhaps one day, she will be their liberator.
